content: There's a 2 1/2 year old issue open on rustup where uninstalling rustup on macOS fails partway through. Additionally, it seems to delete rustup but not finish the uninstall, which is unfortunate. I haven't been able to confirm whether this is still an issue (because I haven't ever uninstalled Rust and don't want to!), but it would probably be good to figure out what's going on there.
Wasn't sure whether to post this on t-release/triage or here, but I thought that maybe it should be prioritized?
I would raise this issue with the rustup team who are on discord
